job_history.work_description: Assist in transition to electronic medical records, essentially acting as a personal assistant to the physician; performing documentation in the EHR, documenting information during the patient's visit, and partnering with the physician to deliver the pinnacle of efficient patient care.
Provide personalized attention, professional instruction, and exercise programming to each client, in order to maximize their health, fitness, and wellness goals, post-injury rehabilitation.

Assists in examination and treatment of patients under the direction of a physician. Interviews patients, measures vital signs, draws necessary blood samples and prepares specimens for laboratory analysis.

Provided personalized attention, professional instruction, and exercise programming to each client, in order to maximize their health, fitness, and wellness goals while providing the highest level of customer service.
Responsible for the administration of patient treatments, as directed by the chiropractor. Obtained and recorded patient vital signs. Scheduled appointments and recorded patient treatments.
Responsible for communicating and upholding company policies and procedures. Managed a clean, friendly and well-maintained club.

skills.name: Electronic Medical Records
skills.explanation: Assisted in the transition to electronic medical records, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Patient Care
skills.explanation: Participated in delivering high-quality patient care as a medical scribe and medical assistant, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Medical Documentation
skills.explanation: Documented patient information in electronic health records, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Personal Training
skills.explanation: Provided personalized attention and exercise programming to clients, showing strong proficiency in personal training.

skills.name: Health and Wellness
skills.explanation: Helped clients achieve their health and wellness goals, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided high-quality customer service as a personal trainer, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed a fitness club and communicated company policies, showing some practical experience in leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Effectively managed time as a medical scribe, personal trainer, and fitness manager, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Demonstrated effective communication skills as a medical scribe, personal trainer, and fitness manager, indicating a solid working proficiency.
